chara.textHome: Welcome! My aunt and uncle run this inn.

Whatcha think? We can enjoy summer
to the max here, don'tcha think?

Mornin'! I got up real early so
I took a trip around the beach.

It's still not too hot yet,
and the breeze feels great.
I'm gonna go again, wanna come with?
*Yawn* I'm gonna chill now that I've eaten.

It's fun playing on the shore,
but watching other people play from the
beach house isn't half bad either!
Okay, what's for dinner?!

We're at the beach, so it'd be
a waste not to have seafood!

But you know, everything tastes
even better after a good swim.

We're at the beach at night,
and you know what that means!
Right, fireworks!
I brought loads!
I'm not gonna let you sleep 'till they're gone!

You gotta be diligent about
reapplying sunscreen.
Even I put effort into that, y'know?
Cause you'll be sorry once you get burned.

Summer! The beach!
Snuffing out Witches!

I might be in total summer mode,
but I'm not taking it easy on Witch hunts!

It's so hot, I wonder if these summer temps'll
tire my opponents out...

Anyway! I'm gonna push through and
totally beat this heat!
Long-distance swimmers, on your marks!
Oooh, everyone looks raring to go.
First one to that island over there wins!
Ready...GO!

Y'know that thing where you
yell "Ahhh!" into the fan?
It's pretty childish, but I still do it anyway...
Hey, Kyoko!
The blue shaved ice is mine!
Don't you eat one bite of it!
It's MINE, eat your own!
Surfers use that beach over there.
Wonder how it feels to ride a wave?
I gotta give it a try some time!
Tadaaa!
Whatcha think of my swimsuit?

I got a brand new one 'cause
we're all going to the beach.

Maybe I'm too hyped up about it?
Ha ha!

Madoka and Homura both look great
in their swimsuits.
Cute, girly...

But I just don't think
that kind of style suits me.
Man! Have you seen Mami in her swimsuit?

She's aced the sexy look
AND the cute look in one go!
Wish I could pull that off.
You think I should show him my swimsuit?
Wh-why would I do that?!
We're just childhood friends...
It'd be weird to just show up in a swimsuit.

Oooh, what's up?
Entranced by my beauty in this outfit?
G-geeze, don't react like that!
Now you're making ME blush.
